name: INSetCarLockStatusIntent
desc: A request to lock or unlock the user’s car.

items.name: init(locked: Bool?, carName: INSpeakableString?)
items.desc: Initializes an intent to set the lock status of the named car.

items.name: var carName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: A name that identifies the user’s car.

items.name: var locked: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to lock the car.
